com.example.economicaldiagram

Class DiagramViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.economicaldiagram.DiagramViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IControllerUI

    public class DiagramViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IControllerUI
    Computes points to build diagram Draws diagram and handles touch events.
    Since:
    android 2.3.3
    Version:
    1.00, 18.06.2013
    Author:
    careful7j

      • toHandle

        protected boolean toHandle
        To handle or not user's touches.
        Touches start to handle when user touches the screen. When users removes his finger from the screen touches are not handled any more. When user pulls a sector out from diagram touches are not handled any more.

      • handleTouch

        private void handleTouch(int eventX,
               int eventY)
        Computes direction and rotation speed of diagram when rotation mode and direction and shift speed for sector when mode move.
        Parameters:
        eventX - X of user's touch point
        eventY - Y of user's touch point

        Parameters:

      • computeSectorsBounds

        private void computeSectorsBounds(int categoryId,
                        float frameLast)
        Computes sector's start and end points
        Parameters:
        categoryId - Number of sector to compute points for
        frameLast - Previous sector end

      • findActiveSectorId

        private int findActiveSectorId()
        Determines which sector in now under user's finger
        Returns:
        Sector id

      • getAngle

        private float getAngle(float oldX,
             float oldY,
             float newX,
             float newY)
        Computes the angle between two points using diagram's center as the third point
        Parameters:
        oldX - Value X of point 1 ( Previous touch point )
        oldY - Value Y of point 1 ( Previous touch point )
        newX - Value X of point 2 ( Point that user touches now )
        newY - Value Y of point 2 ( Point that user touches now )
        Returns:
        angle between two points in radians ( diagram center as the third point )

      • computeDiagramPoints

        private float[] computeDiagramPoints(int AXIS)
        Computes points of diagram polygon. Points are copied 4 times to ease rotation algorithm.
        Parameters:
        AXIS - Axis points are computed for
        Returns:
        Diagram polygon's points

      • concat

        private float[] concat(float[] A,
             float[] B)
        Merges two arrays into one by values ( first array fully then second )
        Parameters:
        A - array one
        B - array two
        Returns:
        array that contains values of both arrays

      • computeHelpAnimation

        protected float[] computeHelpAnimation(int AXIS)
        Computes points of help animation polygon.
        Parameters:
        AXIS - Axis points are computed for
        Returns:
        Help animation polygon's points
